description: This Dart file defines a theming class 'AppTheme' for a Flutter project, providing color palette constants and a method to generate a light theme using Material 3 design principles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class that provides theme data for the application, including color palette and styling configurations.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with light mode colors, fonts, and component styles.
